Reference

AEC functions

Functions used in the preparation of the Annual Epidemiological Commentary

aec_age_sex_plot()

Plot rates by age and sex structure, faceted by financial year.

aec_age_trend_pc()

Graph trend in percentage of cases by age group

aec_age_trend_rate()

Graph trend in rate of cases by age and sex

aec_create_folder_structure()

Set up empty folders for Annual publication

aec_ec_source_plot()

Plot the most likely primary focus for E. coli bacteraemia by time to onset

aec_inpatient()

Determine whether record is from an acute Trust inpatient for AEC

aec_subregion_plot()

Plot rates by NHS subregion

aec_tto_plot()

AEC time to onset plot

Monthly output functions

Functions used in preparation of monthly outputs

mo_curr_months()

Create months for monthly outputs

mo_gnabsi_table()

Monthly table for Gram-negative blood stream infection data

mo_next_pub_date()

Returns the next publication date of the monthly outputs Used in construction of file paths to get to raw data and also for printing in text of monthly factsheet.

mo_prior_hc_table()

mo_prior_hc_table

mo_pub_date()

Nicely formats date of publication for monthly data

mo_std_table()

Monthly CCG table
